name: countdown_1
description: Countdown style announcement with centered title, dual number boxes, description, and footer promo.

samples.description_text: DAYS LEFT UNTIL NEW PRODUCT LAUNCH

fieldPrompt.title_color: Enter the color for the main title text.
fieldPrompt.count_box_color: Enter the background color for the number boxes.
fieldPrompt.count_text_color: Enter the color for the digits inside the boxes.
fieldPrompt.description_color: Enter the color for the description line.
fieldPrompt.logo_url: Enter the logo image URL (recommended transparent PNG/SVG).
fieldPrompt.title_text: Enter the main uppercase title text.
fieldPrompt.description_text: Enter the description message below the boxes.
fieldPrompt.footer_line_one: Enter the first footer line (e.g., offer).
fieldPrompt.footer_line_two: Enter the second footer line (e.g., website).
fieldPrompt.custom_html: Optional: extra HTML to append inside the poster.

components.html_content:
${title_text}
${count_left_digit}
${count_right_digit}
${description_text}
${footer_line_one}
${footer_line_two}
${custom_html}
